summary: In September 2004, Chechen rebels occupied a school in the small Russian city of Beslan, taking some 1,200 people-most of them children-hostage. At the end of three days, over 330 were dead.
cast: Ruslan Aushev|Shamil Basayev|Dmitry Beliakov|Dariya Fadeeva|Vladimir Putin|Julia Roberts
title: Beslan: Three Days in September
